name: dloop-ai-governance-nodes
description: DLoop AI Governance Nodes using elizaOS framework for autonomous DAO participation

scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run start:local
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run build:netlify-functions
scripts.build:netlify-functions: mkdir -p dist/netlify/functions && tsc netlify/functions/governance-agent.ts --outDir dist/netlify/functions --target ES2022 --module ESNext --moduleResolution node && cp public/index.html dist/ && cp netlify/functions/scheduled-voting.js dist/netlify/functions/
scripts.build:static: mkdir -p dist/netlify/functions && cp -r public/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && tsc netlify/functions/governance-agent.ts --outDir dist/netlify/functions --target ES2022 --module ESNext --moduleResolution node
scripts.build:netlify: mkdir -p dist/netlify/functions && cp -r characters dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp netlify.toml dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && tsc netlify/functions/governance-agent.ts --outDir dist/netlify/functions --target ES2022 --module ESNext --moduleResolution node
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:local
scripts.setup: echo 'Please configure .env file with required variables'

author: DLoop AI Governance Team
